Help:Node.title: address
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: address scroll to [person]
EXAMPLE: address scroll to Azrael (Do not use quotation marks)
Addresses a scroll to the specified person. After you $(udat.chatchar)WRITE your scroll and $(udat.chatchar)SIGN it, you should $(udat.chatchar)GIVE it to a courier, who will be sure the scroll gets to the addressee.
SEE ALSO: , , , ,
